price: Ubwo impanda izavuzwa inshuro imwe (ya mbere).
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
